author: vdichev
msg: Huge merge from old repo- tests for login, follow, unfollow, profile change, every N mins; actions for Atom and RSS feeds; possible to send HTTP data in HTTP POST, and others.

author: rdonkin
msg: Revise storage schema. Messages content (body and headers) is read only. Copying large messages around is expensive. So, just store the message content once and introduce MailboxMemebership table to link mailbox with message. Note that the cascading delete may not be quite right yet so this isn't production ready.
